welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tobetsu, Japan! Known for its charming countryside and traditional festivals, we invite you to immerse yourself in our rich culture and explore all that our city has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Okadama Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Okadama Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chitose Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chitose Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 3 hours per day.
